entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one screaming with derisive laughter and trying to push Harry out of the way. She is also mentioned as being close to tears.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being pushed by Ginny and having a picture of Auntie Muriel stashed under his pillow. He is also mentioned as snogging Cho Chang.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being pushed up against the wall by Harry.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is mentioned as a pet that Ginny accuses Harry of kissing.

entities.name: auntie muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is mentioned as someone whose picture Ginny accuses Harry of having stashed under his pillow.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is mentioned as someone that Harry snogged.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who snogged Viktor Krum.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as someone that Hermione snogged.

relationships.description: Harry and Cho Chang are mentioned as having snogged.
Hermione and Viktor Krum are mentioned as having snogged.
